abstract: Marc Benioff is not unhappy his speech at Oracle's trade show was canceled. The Salesforce chief executive is even getting back the money he paid to speak at the show.
snippet: Marc Benioff is not unhappy his speech at Oracle's trade show was canceled. The Salesforce chief executive is even getting back the money he paid to speak at the show.

headline.main: Benioff Enjoys the Spotlight, Even When It Is Turned Off
